reviewText: Sifu Sam Hing Fai Chan continues to add exceptional training opportunities in the study of authentic Ip Man Wing Chun Kuen with his clarity of insight into the third hand form of Wing Chun, Biu Gee (Thrusting Fingers).  As with all of Chan's Martial Arts Production media, the production quality is outstanding and the content is invaluable to an appreciation of the art and science within the Wing Chun system of combat.

I train with Sifu Chan on a weekly basis, and bought this DVD for my personal collection.  It has been great to reinforce what I'm learning in training classes.  High quality, very detailed DVD.  You won't be disappointed.  I've seen some BAD wing chun DVDs out there, but this isn't one of them!
